  <title>Active Oil and Gas Wells</title>
  <abstract>Idaho Oil and Gas well database. These data were derived mostly from historical well paper logs and reports. This database also includes newly drilled and producing wells. Information for active wells is from journal articles, well permits from Idaho Department of Lands, and electric logs.</abstract>

  </links>

  <rights>New well data came from Idaho Department of Lands, electric logs, Rigzone.com, Oil and Gas Journal. Historic well data came from the Idaho Geological Survey publication DD-3, Historical Oil and Gas data for Idaho: 1903-1988.</rights>
